features: RGB lighting modes: Lighting design in the four sides of the mouse pad, this could highlight the atmosphere when you playing video games.
Extra large size: XXL size ( 35.4 * 15.7 inch) is large enough to accommodate both the mouse and the keyboard, as well as you smartphone.
Smooth and waterproof surface: The surface of the mouse pad is waterproof, it’s easy to clean and no worry about accidental stains.
Micro usb charging: The RGB mouse pad was powered by Micro USB. Plug and play, no drive and one-touch control makes it convenient to switch the colors.
Anti slip rubber base: Ultra thick natural rubber base ensures the pad sturdy as well as anti-slip. It will stay firmly on your desk, even glass surface desk.
body.description: Features: Different LED lighting modes could match your LED mouse and keyboards perfectly. Designed with a superfine fiber braided material, with a micro-textured and smooth surface, all these could offer you a great gaming experience. One button to turn on the lights, long press 3s to turn off. Luminescent high polymer optic fiber layer, makes the lights bright but would not deter you from staring at the monitor or display. The smooth surface enables you to control the mouse accurately and optimizes your gaming experience. RGB LED lights make your mouse pad cool and stylish.Note: The pad was made of natural rubber, so be patience when the parcel arrived: Better leave it out of the room for 1-2 days, let the rubber semll disappear befroe using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good quality , decent size , lights up with led lights. Usb cord comes with it as well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it, made my daughter happy.
reviews.reviewText: My daughter is a bit of a "gamer", she happens to love Rick & Morty, I found this and thought it was the best birthday gift idea I could find for her. Happy to report she loved it, and the edges do light up and you can control the colors and movement around the edges as well. It is quite large, and the fabric seems hefty enough. It is still too early to tell. I am sure it will get tested thoroughly. Worth the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Feels like it should be a lot more for what your getting. This thing is amazing. Amazing quality! The colors are vibrant and the lights are great. I’m about a couple months into having it now and no issues with the lights breaking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This pad was much bigger than I expected and it looks great on my little gamers desk! Lights are amazing! Just BUY IT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Got it as a gift and it’s a great mat it’s made of a good material and the print is super vibrant .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wire problems keep this from being 5 stars.
reviews.reviewText: First off, the mouse pad is good quality and the lights look great. The design looks amazing. But, there seems to be quality control issues with the plug/receiver. The lights won’t turn on unless the plug is positioned in the connection a certain way. I ended up taping the wire down to keep it in this position. It’s a problem but not one I feel like going through return process to remedy. The tape isn’t noticeable on my wood desk and it hides under the top of the desk anyways.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow..... not what I was expecting!
reviews.reviewText: It's not often that it's said this way, but I kean this in a completely good way. When it arrived on time, which is kind of a big deal for me (that's a whole other story) I was pleasantly surprised. Then I opened it, BANG.... at least twice as big as I thought it was. I mean this thing is huge ND the picture on it awesome and super clear with no issues. Keep it up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Some weird setting but after setting up and putting on a arm mount I love it I can't go black to non ultra wide also had to use ultra wide plugin for chrome to see YouTube videos for ultra wide
